description: This is a recipe to build a uwsgi binary as well as the xml config file.            Its a modified version of httpsgithub.compsychotechnikeqb.recipe.uwsgi            which is in turn a modified version of             httpsgithub.comshaunsephtonshaunsephton.recipe.uwsgi
longdescription: This is a recipe to build a uwsgi binary as well as the xml config file.            Its a modified version of httpsgithub.compsychotechnikeqb.recipe.uwsgi            which is in turn a modified version of             httpsgithub.comshaunsephtonshaunsephton.recipe.uwsgi
